name: Captain Obama
description:
Does our hero manage to defend the White House from the looming threats and keep the peace?

How play: The game supports touch, pressing on the black arrows to move and fire button to shoot. In place of touch, you can use the up and down arrow keys to move and the Z button to shoot. For extra life, being hit by the Red Cross

For comments, reports of bugs or informations: scardygames@yahoo.it
